img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a player character is confronting a large, menacing creature with fiery red appendages. The setting appears to be a snowy, ancient temple or shrine, with stone steps leading up to the creature. The player character is equipped with a staff and is wearing a cloak made of straw or grass. The interface shows various icons and gauges, including health and stamina bars at the bottom of the screen. The text "Captain Kalpa Wave" is displayed, possibly indicating the name of the creature or the current mission.
